title: Did the Alabama prosecutor ever tell Ko Klux Klan to kiss my ass?
subtitle: Bill Baxley wrote a famous shortcut to the Great Dragon KKK in 1976 in response to threats to intimidate him.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The former State Attorney of Alabama, Bill Baxley, once said Ko Klux Klan the Great Dragon "kissing my ass" in response to threats.
